Entries.Rainy_Night_5: Finally, you're home! I'm bored... Wanna curl up and watch a movie?#$b#I've been wanting to watch the one about {{random: the fairy and the goblin that fall in love, dinosaur zombies, the princess and the pirate queen}}$1

Entries.JojaMart_Tue: Can I interest you in a nice pair of juicy, ripe melons? End of aisle one, fresh from the Gem Isles!$1
How about some eggplant seeds? You know what they say about girls and eggplants...? We love 'em deepfried!$1
Are you lonely and cold on that farm of yours? We've got some great hot chilli-sauce! Guaranteed to warm you from head to ah... you know where!$1

Entries.Juliet: I love the sound of the rain. And the best thing? I don't have to go to work!
Entries.Jessie: It's a beautiful day, isn't it @? Of course I know it's raining! The plants love it, and it means Juliet is forced to spend quality time with me.$1

Entries.Juliet0: Hmm, last days of freedom. What to do? Oh, I'm teasing, @. I'm excited! Really!
Entries.Juliet1: Hey,@. I seem to remember there's something I'm supposed to be doing tomorrow... but I can't quite remember what it was.#$b#Just kidding! We're getting hitched and you'll be stuck with me forever!

Entries.Juliet_invite: Hey babe!^Guess what? Entries.Sun2: You're not afraid of spiders, are you? My housemate, Jade, is sweet on all kinds of creepy crawlies, so you never know what might crawl into your ear when you're asleep.
Entries.Sun4: At breakfast this morning, one of Jade's 8-legged friends marched straight across the table. Not gonna lie, I almost screamed like a little girl.#$b#And calm as anything, Jessie picked it up - in her bare hands! - and put it outside!
Entries.Sun6: Jade's been going on about fairies again. I mean, yeh, there's more things in this world than we know and all that nonsense, but me? I'll believe in them when I see them, right?
Entries.LodgingHouse_Sat: Hey @, have you come to listen to me play? I hope Jade wasn't planning a lie-in!$2

Entries.funLeave_Juliet: Heading in to bare my soul to Yoba today. Want me to put in a good word for you?#$b#Oh, I'm sure we can think of a few sins to atone for.$4
Entries.funReturn_Juliet: Yoba sends their regards. Also I found this on the way home. Do you think it's a sign? [376 420 422]#$b#Nah, me neither.$1

Entries.Neutral_8: I've been thinking about getting a new tattoo.#$b#Maybe of a {{Random: vampire bat, bouquet of toxic flowers, t-rex in a tutu, zombie sheep}}.#$b#What do you think?

Entries.JojaMart_Tue: Hey, farmer @. Looking to plant some crops? Ours are genetically enhanced! Yes really! But they probably won't make you grow two heads.$7

Entries.Juliet_NoMarried: Oh yeah, right. 'Course you are.$5#$b#You don't have to pretend, @. I can take no for an answer, you know.$2

Entries.Mon2: Do you smoke, @? I tried it once, but it kinda sucked, you know.#$b#Hah, I've got better stuff to spend my hard-earned pennies on.
Entries.Mon4: There's gotta be something we can do to liven up this quiet little town.#$b#Hmmm.... I wonder if Lewis would let me organize one of the festivals. Hah, that'd be a hoot.$1
Entries.summer_Thu: All work and no play, and all that... Hope you're finding some time to have fun, farmer.$1#$b#You're not a Joja desk slave anymore, after all!
Entries.summer_Fri6: You wanna head to the beach this weekend, @? Yeh, I figured I might check out the local talent.

Entries.Mon8: Hey, Chickenman Shane seems much happier these days. I swear I almost saw him smile!#$b#Guess finally hooking up with someone suits him. Heh, to each their own!

Entries.fall_Juliet: Good morning lover! Well, I'm off for the day! Laters!$1#$b#Oh, here's a little something to stop you wearing yourself out. I have plans for you later.$4[240]

Entries.6398443/f Juliet 2749/o Juliet/O {{spous: playful/12 17/Juliet -100 -100 0 farmer 12 18 0/addConversationTopic Juliet_TalentShow 7/skippable/pause 500/speak Juliet "Oh good, you're home.$1#$b#Sooooo, I may have mentioned to the Mayor that things were pretty dull around here and... guess what?"/emote farmer 8/pause 500/speak Juliet "I've got a promotion! I'm now the Official Events Co-ordinator for PT!"/emote farmer 16/speak Juliet "Yeh, I'm pretty sure he made it up, and he's just palming off responsibility again, but who cares?#$b#I'm officially organizing an event to 'invigorate the community.'#$b#His words, not mine. Pretentious BS. It's a party. Let's call it a party.$1"/quickQuestion #Sounds great, you'll do an awesome job!#That's a lot of responsibility, are you sure you're up for it?#He's just trying to get you off his back.(break)emote Juliet 20\speak Juliet "Yeah, I hope so!
